EmailTemplate.name: 201907_Americas_Event_HOC_OH_KFK.201907_Americas_Invite_HOC_OH_MC.Subject Line T
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Honeywell for the Cleveland Operators Conference - August 14
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
BUSINESS & GENERAL AVIATION CLEVELAND OPERATORS CONFERENCE INVITATION Dear Customers and Partners,
We are pleased to invite you to the 2019 Honeywell Operators Conference! This is a great chance to meet the Honeywell team and get your questions answered. Sign up now don’t miss the chance spots are limited!
Date: August 14, 2019 Time: 9:00 am to 4:00 pm Event cost: Free for Honeywell Customers – please feel free to invite your colleagues Venue: House of Blues Cleveland 308 Euclid Avenue, Cleveland, OH 44114 Phone: (216) 523-2583
Training certificates for 8 hrs. of credit will be issued to attendees.
CLICK HERE TO RSVP <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/events-listing/2019/january/2019-operator-conferences]]> Learn about Honeywell Solutions
We will highlight Honeywell’s hardware and services, including the latest upgrades, STCs, and mandates Honeywell Support Processes
Overview on Honeywell processes and how to make the system work for you. Honeywell staff will share best practices and are ready to answer your questions. Unique Venue
House of Blues, each attendee will have access to explore one of the coolest venues in Cleveland. This event is open to all Honeywell customers. Please feel free to share the invitation with your flight department and customers.
We look forward to meeting you in Cleveland!
Best regards, Your Customer Core Team Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
